RelatedSentence: HERRIMAN - A man has drowned while trying to swim across a chilly reservoir just south of Salt Lake City .
Unified police have identified the victim as 19 - year - old Joey Pantoja .
Authorities say Pantoja was swimming with a friend near the middle of Blackridge Reservoir in Herriman about 6 p.m. Sunday when he became distressed and went under the water .

A friend tried to help but could n't pull him above the surface .
